_storage_data.config_has_duplicates: Files with the same name in "{config}"
_storage_data.config_has_duplicates_description: The following files have different values connected to the same name. The uniqueness of the name ignores case sensitivity.
_storage_data.config_has_duplicates_description_2: By clicking on "Continue" only one version of the files per name will be downloaded. To download all versions, you will need to rename them uniquely in On Page.
